problem.para: The Inca were able to control an empire that stretched from modern Colombia to southern Chile. Which of their various means for achieving such control do you think were most effective, and why?
What were the lasting effects of the Crusades? In what ways did they provide opportunities both negative and positive for cross-cultural encounters and exchanges?
Was race identified with slavery before the era of European exploration? Why or why not? How did slaverys association with race change the institutions character?
